item.title: pbctf 2021: Seed Me & Yet Another RSA
item.description:
What's the thumbnail? I sent it to @rbtree after I sent him my solution on Yet Another PRNG and he responded "oh this works?".

I am playing as a part of @blackb6a this time for perfect blue's annual pbctf. This time there are six crypto challenges and I first blooded ðŸ©¸ half of them. I solved five of them, and collaborated with @TWY (who made 99% of the process) for Seed Me. In this blog post, I will cover Seed Me and Yet Another RSA. I tried to make the whole post beginner friendly, hence included more details than necessary.
